Scripts.OnClick: if string.find(this:GetName(),"LFG") or string.find(this:GetName(),"SearchList") then if this:GetChecked() then GF_AddRemoveSearch(string.sub(string.gsub(this:GetName(),"(%w)%d*","%1"), 4), getglobal(this:GetName().."TextLabel"):GetText(), true) else if getglobal(this:GetName().."TextLabel"):GetText() == "Clear" then for i=1, GF_NumLFGSearchButtons-1 do local button = getglobal(string.gsub(this:GetName(),"(%a)%d*","%1")..i) button:SetChecked(false) end this:SetChecked(true) end GF_AddRemoveSearch(string.sub(string.gsub(this:GetName(),"%d*",""), 4), getglobal(this:GetName().."TextLabel"):GetText(), nil) end end

if arg1 == "LeftButton" then if IsShiftKeyDown() then if not GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts then GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts = true DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_ON) else GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts = nil DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_OFF) end GF_ShowChatCheckButton:SetChecked(GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts); else GF_ToggleMainFrame(); end else if GF_GroupsInChatCheckButton:GetChecked() then GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat = nil; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_GROUP_OFF) else GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat = true; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_GROUP_ON) end GF_GroupsInChatCheckButton:SetChecked(GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat); end
if not GF_SearchList:IsShown() then GF_ShowDropdownList("SearchList") else GF_SearchList:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "SearchList")) then GF_SearchList:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "SearchList")) then GF_SearchList:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if GF_AutoAnnounceTimer then GF_TurnOffAnnounce() else if GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:GetText() ~= "" then GF_TurnOnAnnounce() else DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_NOTHING_TO_ANNOUNCE2, 1, 1, 0.5) end end
if not GF_LFGSize:IsShown() then GF_ShowDropdownList("LFGSize") else GF_LFGSize:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGSize")) then GF_LFGSize:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGSize")) then GF_LFGSize:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if not GF_LFGLFM:IsShown() then GF_ShowDropdownList("LFGLFM") else GF_LFGLFM:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGLFM")) then GF_LFGLFM:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGLFM")) then GF_LFGLFM:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGDungeon")) then GF_LFGDungeon:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGDungeon")) then GF_LFGDungeon:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGRaid")) then GF_LFGRaid:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGRaid")) then GF_LFGRaid:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGRole")) then GF_LFGRole:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if not GF_LFGWhoClass:IsShown() then GF_ShowDropdownList("LFGWhoClass") else GF_LFGWhoClass:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGWhoClass")) then GF_LFGWhoClass:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGWhoClass")) then GF_LFGWhoClass:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if GF_LogEditBox:IsShown() then GF_LogEditBox:Hide() else GF_LogEditBox:Show() end
GF_SavedVariables.joinworld = this:GetChecked(); if GF_SavedVariables.joinworld then GF_JoinWorld(); else LeaveChannelByName(GF_CHANNEL_NAME) end

Scripts.OnHide: GF_LFGSize:Hide() GF_LFGLFM:Hide() GF_LFGDungeon:Hide() GF_LFGRaid:Hide() GF_LFGRole:Hide() GF_LFGWhoClass:Hide() GF_SearchList:Hide()
